basics.label: Mineralogy Engineering Intern
basics.summary: Passionate graduate student in extractive metallurgy with solid industrial experience, a diverse academic background, and strong leadership and relationship-building skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Working with lab and pilot plant scale project in minerals processing including flotation, magnetic separation, screening.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and performed a study on several quality issues for anode production. Collaborated with operations, technical, and maintenance to ensure implementation of project. Conducted laboratory work for XRD/XRF measurements of ore.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Researched and reviewed differing pipeline coating technologies in the academia realm. Conducted evaluations for existing commercially available coatings and provided a suggestion for their use.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided assistance to technical operations, primary process, quality, and pilot plant. Developed and performed a study on several quality issues. Created a report with laboratory results that encompassed a solution to quality problems. Produced a plan for a new expansion of the plant.

courses: Thesis work comprises of flotation fundamentals including zeta potential, contact angle, adsorption density as well lab scale flotation.
